<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Qumran</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qumran</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This web page describes Qumran located on the northwestern shore of the Dead Sea, several kilometers south of Jericho Bedouins in 1947 found the first Dead Sea scrolls . South of Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dead sea scrolls</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Webseite beschreibt Qumran, das auf dem 
nordwestlichen Ufer des Toten Meers, einige Kilometer gelegen ist, die
Süden der Jericho Beduinen in 1947 ersten Schriftrolle vom Toten Meer
fand. Süden von Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page Web décrit Qumran situé sur le 
rivage du nord-ouest de la mer morte, plusieurs kilomètres que les 
sud des bédouins de Jéricho dans 1947 ont trouvé les 
premiers défilements de mer morte. Sud de Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web page descreve Qumran situado na costa do
noroeste do mar inoperante, diversos quilômetros que o sul de 
bedouins de Jericho em 1947 encontrou os primeiros scrolls de mar 
inoperante. Sul de Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web page descrive Qumran situato sul 
puntello nordoccidentale del mare guasto, parecchi chilometri che sud 
dei bedouins de Jericho in 1947 ha trovato i primi rotoli di mare 
guasto. Sud di Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ιστοσελίδας περιγράφει Qumran που βρίσκεται 
στη βορειοδυτική ακτή της νεκρής θάλασσας, ο νότος διάφορων 
χιλιομέτρων του Jericho Bedouins το 1947 βρήκε τους 
πρώτους νεκρούς κυλίνδρους θάλασσας. Νότος Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web page describe Qumran situado en la 
orilla del noroeste del mar muerto, varios kilómetros que el sur de 
los beduinos de Jericho en 1947 encontró los primeros desfiles de mar
muerto. Sur de Qumran,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schriftrolle vom Toten Meer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">défilements de mer morte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">scrolls de mar inoperante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotoli di mare guasto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νεκροί κύλινδροι θάλασσας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qumran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desfiles de mar muerto</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
